db:abstract.db:para: The QtRemoteObjects global object provides useful functions for working with remote types in QML.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.14.

db:section.db:title: Promise watch(QRemoteObjectPendingCall reply, int timeout = 30000)
db:section.db:para: Encapsulates the return value, represented by reply, from a replica in a JavaScript Promise. A timeout can be set with timeout. The default timeout value is 30 seconds.
